contextId.occurrenceNote: Here the word "man" represents people in general. Alternate translation: "about people, for he knew what was in people" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-gendernotations]])
contextId.quote: περὶ τοῦ ἀνθρώπου ... γὰρ ἐγίνωσκεν τί ἦν ἐν τῷ ἀνθρώπῳ
contextId.glQuote: about man, for he knew what was in man
